titles.title: VA Vendor Verification Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish credentialing requirements for medical vendors.
VA Vendor Verification Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
VA Vendor Verification Act
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs to establish uniform credentialing standards for medical vendors based on the standards prescribed in the "Joint Recommendation for Healthcare Industry Representative (HCIR) Credentialing Best Practices" by the Coalition for Best Practices in HCIR Requirements.
